group_1.textLeft: Owwwwww!
The fuck is your problem, Ranka?! @Don't go poking at my wounds, you dumbass!

group_1.textRight: I was just checking to see if you'd healed up yet.

group_1.textLeft: You saw what happened to me that night.
It's gonna take forever before it heals!
Gah, it hurts...

group_1.textRight: Anyway, look how empty the base is now. @It's a total ghost town.

group_1.textLeft: I figured it would be, since everyone's faith @was in my strength.

group_1.textRight: That's surprising. Sounds like you've been waiting @for this to happen.

group_1.textLeft: I just know a lot about myself.

group_1.textRight: Then you could've changed yourself a bit, @couldn't you?

group_1.textLeft: No way.
My old man and I both did everything we could,
but still failed despite that...

group_1.textRight: But what are you gonna do now? You might end up alone at this rate...

group_1.textLeft: What am I supposed to do? @Go back to workin' for Yuna?
Not a chance.
Juri the Great will never work under Yuna again.
'Cause she's the only one who can satisfy my urges.

group_1.textRight: You're such a pain in the ass.

group_1.textLeft: Then why don't you leave like everyone else? @You don't have to stay with me.
Why not?

group_1.textRight: Because you saved me from the Bat of Monzenbashi.

group_1.textLeft: You're talkin' about a dead woman. @Juri the Great's pretty much dead now, too.
Ranka, you're free to go. @Go on, leave already.

group_1.textRight: Back then, I did everything the Bat told me to.
Even things I didn't want to...
Because I thought I couldn't make it without @someone strong nearby.
But then you saved me from her, and I decided I wouldn't follow someone just because they were strong.
And I still owe you for that.

group_1.textLeft: ...If you wanna stay so bad, @Juri the Great won't stop you.
Suit yourself.
